commands.name: optimize-string
commands.title: Optimize SVG String
commands.subtitle: SVGO
commands.description: Reads the clipboard content as plain text and copies the optimized SVG string to the clipboard.

preferences.name: paste
preferences.description: If checked, the command will automatically paste the optimized SVG string to the frontmost application.
preferences.label: Paste to frontmost application

commands.name: optimize-files
commands.title: Optimize SVG Files
commands.subtitle: SVGO
commands.description: Creates one or multiple optimized SVG files based on the current Finder selection.
